Name: Abalone
Description: I got an abalone! Why do I want a sandwich now?

Name: Acorn Barnacle
Description: I got an acorn barnacle! Will it grow into an oak barnacle?
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Chambered Nautilus
Description: I got a chambered nautilus! Is it on the naughty list?

Name: Dungeness Crab
Description: I got a Dungeness crab! Dun dun duuuun...geness.

Name: Firefly Squid
Description: I got a firefly squid! More like a glowswim squid.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Flatworm
Description: I got a flatworm! Guess it forgot its spareworm.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Gazami Crab
Description: I got a gazami crab! What a gripping find!

Name: Giant Isopod
Description: GAAAAH! I got a giant isopod! It's the crustodian of the sea.

Name: Gigas Giant Clam
Description: I got a gigas giant clam! It's kind of a big deal.

Name: Horseshoe Crab
Description: I got a horseshoe crab! I hope it's lucky!

Name: Lobster
Description: I got a lobster! Lobjective complete.

Name: Mantis Shrimp
Description: I got a mantis shrimp! Shrimply amazing!

Name: Moon Jellyfish
Description: I got a moon jellyfish! Now to find a sun peanutbutterfish.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Mussel
Description: I got a mussel! It's been working out
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Octopus
Description: I got an octopus! It can give four hugs at once!
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Oyster
Description: I got an oyster! It's a little shellfish.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Pearl Oyster
Description: I got a pearl oyster! Aw, shucks. Don't clam up now!

Name: Red King Crab
Description: I caught a red king crab! It's royally flushed.

Name: Scallop
Description: I got a scallop! It otter be savored.

Name: Sea Anemone
Description: I got a sea anemone! The enemy of my anemone is my afrenome!
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Sea Cucumber
Description: I got a sea cucumber! It's a bit cumbersome...
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Sea Grapes
Description: I got some sea grapes! Can't let these go sour.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Sea Pig
Description: I got a sea pig! What's next? Air pigs?

Name: Sea Pineapple
Description: I got a sea pineapple! Your move, sea pizzas.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Sea Slug
Description: I got a sea slug! It's kinda salty about that.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Sea Star
Description: I got a sea star! Maybe it'll give me an autograph!
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Sea Urchin
Description: I got a sea urchin! Wasn't even 'earchin for it.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Seaweed
Description: I got some seaweed! I couldn't kelp myself.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Slate Pencil Urchin
Description: I got a slate pencil urchin! Its handwriting is gorgeous.

Name: Snow Crab
Description: I got a snow crab! It's giving me the cold shoulder.

Name: Spider Crab
Description: I got a spider crab! Water bugs can rest easy.

Name: Spiny Lobster
Description: I got a spiny lobster! It's got a lot of backbone!

Name: Spotted Garden Eel
Description: I got a spotted garden eel! Was it un-spotted before I saw it?
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Sweet Shrimp
Description: I got a sweet shrimp! It's being very considerate.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Tiger Prawn
Description: I got a tiger prawn! I ain't lion!

Name: Turban Shell
Description: I got a turban shell! It's totally TURB...ular!
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game

Name: Umbrella Octopus
Description: I got an umbrella octopus! Too bad I'm already soaked.

Name: Vampire Squid
Description: I got a vampire squid! A lot was at stake.

Name: Venus' Flower Basket
Description: I got a Venus' flower basket! Why was she picking flowers here?

Name: Whelk
Description: I got a whelk! Happy snails to ya.
SpawnCondition: Appears from the start of the game
